NEW YORK STATE EDUCATIONAL RADIO AND TELEVISION ASSOCIATION
Radio-Television Center Syracuse University
Syracuse 10, New York
March 26, 1963
MEMORANDUM _
To: N.Y.S.E.R.T.A. Members

-rue AV'S.iZ.&T.A. nG MeeuNG -
1) The three commercial television stations of Syracuse,
WHEN, WNYS, and WSYR, will be hosts at a reception for
N.Y.S.E.R.T.A. members at the Hotel Syracuse Country
House at 7 o*clock on the evening of Thursday, April 4*
2) N.Y.S.E.R.T.A. members interested in production will be
given an opportunity to view programs produced by the
various ETV stations and production centers across the
state. WSYR-TV has invited those people attending the
Spring Meeting to a special showing of these taped ed¬
ucational programs at 7:30 p.m. on Friday, April 5,
at the WSYR Television Center.
If you are planning to attend the meeting, but have not yet
registered, please do so at your earliest convenience.
We look forward to seeing you in Syracuse on April 4, 5 and 6.
Sincerely,
The Program Committee
